channel.title: Primal
channel.description:
what's everyones views on primal on rsps's?
I think it is too op but should be allowed to be earned somehow so i'd personally make it so that you'd have to get 120 dung and 1 mil tokens per piece to get it.
How would you make it obtainable on a server? (if at all)

item.title: Primal
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

Primal isn’t that bad for servers, just depends on where and how you add it. I used it for a minigame like Castle Wars and you obtained all items inside of it, and no items left.

Read full topic

item.title: Primal
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:14, topic:458062”][quote author=RandQm link=topic=560984.msg4094220#msg4094220 date=1346693540]

i like godswords but on most servers ags can be one of the most expensive items along with claws. I don’t understand sometimes why people would pay so much for a weapon just for the spec i’d rather see something more useful (like an armour set) be top of the price list instead.

what are dclaws

dragon claws

what are you talking about, there ain’t no dragon claws
[/quote]

Dragon Claws? I think you mean Rune Claws.[/quote]
this

Read full topic

item.title: Primal
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:7, topic:458062”][quote author=MacaYork link=topic=560984.msg4093483#msg4093483 date=1346622403]
is it just primal you wouldn’t add or all dung armours?

I’ve seen some servers where primal is 200k a piece in donator store so basically everyone on the game had it as donator status was 1m rsgp
[/quote]
dark bow is the newest item i’d add, all the rest is from the time rs got ruined, no chance that’s coming into my servers[/quote]

Yeah dark bow was when god sword were added(around that I think)

Godswords aren’t too bad…
But they were hard to obtain the first time they were released.

Read full topic
